definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: perh. (si vera l.) cleave in pieces (Ar. (f0’y, f0’u) f0’0 cleave, split (head, bowl, etc.); Sab. [[פעי]] DHM:ZMG xxx (1876), 701 f.);—

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. 1 s. sf. [[אַפְאֵיהֶם]] De 32:26 I [´[[י]]] will cleave them in pieces (poss. point ´[[אֶפ]], i.e.

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: ; on other views v. Dr; rd. perh. [[אֲַפִיחֵם]] LXX Gr).
